name: Workday
description: Workday is a leading provider of enterprise cloud applications for finance and human resources, helping customers adapt and thrive in a changing world. Workday applications for financial management, human resources, planning, spend management, and analytics are built with artificial intelligence and machine learning at the core to help organizations around the world embrace the future of work. Workday is used by more than 10,000 organizations around the world and across industries – from medium-sized businesses to more than 50% of the Fortune 500.
features: Best-in-class applications for finance, HR, and more
Move forward faster with collaborative, continuous planning
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Inspiring a brighter work day for all
ShortDescription: Only Workday unites finance and HR on one platform where AI and continuous innovation are built into the core.

Highlights.name: Become a rock star of finance
Highlights.description: Make confident decisions faster than ever, identify opportunities, and mitigate risk with data-driven insights.

Highlights.name: Become a rock star of HR
Highlights.description: Deliver the greatest possible impact with a workforce that’s empowered, engaged, and primed to perform.

Highlights.name: Become a rock star of IT
Highlights.description: Adapt processes with ease, ensure compliance, and connect all aspects of your organization.

enhanced_description: Workday is a leading provider of enterprise cloud applications designed for finance and human resources. It uniquely unites financial management, human resources, planning, spend management, and analytics on a single platform. At its core, Workday applications leverage artificial intelligence and machine learning to help organizations globally adapt and thrive. Serving a diverse customer base from medium-sized businesses to over 50% of the Fortune 500, Workday aims to accelerate skill development, enhance data-driven decision making, mitigate risk, and empower a highly engaged and performing workforce. The platform also enables IT to easily adapt processes, ensure compliance, and connect all aspects of the organization.
competitive_advantages: Embedded AI and machine learning at the core
Best-in-class applications for finance and HR
scalability_features: Scales from medium to Fortune 500 organizations
